general_frequency.tooltip: Min value: 1 hour. Max value: 720 hours (30 days).

general_first_check.description: Make a first check one minute after starting
general_first_check.tooltip: By checking this box, the first check will take place one minute after starting this applet.

general_warning.description: Notify me by changing the icon when Spices need an update
general_warning.tooltip: By checking this box, you allow this applet to modify its icon to warn you when at least one of the Spices requires an update.

events_color.description: The icon color when Spices need an update
events_color.tooltip: Click the button to select another color.

general_notifications.description: Show notification messages about Spices updates
general_notifications.tooltip: By checking this box, you allow this applet to display messages about Spices updates in notifications viewer.

general_details_requested.description: Display the description of each update or new Spice
general_details_requested.tooltip:
By checking this box, you'll know why an update is available, and get a description of any new Spice.
This information will be displayed in English.

general_type_notif.tooltip:
Minimal:
	Displays simple and short notifications.
With action buttons:
	Notifications also contain some buttons which have these roles:
		The leftmost button opens the Download tab in System Settings for the concerned Spices, which are sorted by date (most recent first). So you can update the Spices you want.
		The rightmost button refreshes the cache and notifications, if necessary.
		Optionally, a central button allows you to forget new spices or update the installed ones, depending on the case.

general_show_updateall_button.description: Show the 'Update Now' button in notifications
general_show_updateall_button.tooltip:
By checking this box, a button 'Update All' appears in notifications.
By pressing this button:
 1. The Download tab of the System Settings concerning this type of Spices appears.
 2. The cache is updated.
 3. Your Spices are updated.
 4. When all updates are made, just close the window.

general_test_notif.description: Send a fake notification to test the style

displayType.tooltip: This feature offers the Classic (default) display with icon and text, and compact display (Icon Only).

general_hide.description: Hide the icon as long as nothing is to report
general_hide.tooltip: By checking this box, as long as nothing is to report the icon of Spices Update does not appear on the panel.
